moreBlocks.articles:
• Personal Injury
    If you or a loved one has been injured in an accident, you should seek experienced legal representation right away.
  • Auto Accidents
    After listening carefully to your description of events, we will clearly explain what needs to be done to protect your physical health as well as your legal rights and financial best interests.
  • Truck Accidents
    We help injured victims obtain financial compensation for their medical bills, pain and suffering, lost wages, property damage and more.
  • Serious and Catastrophic Injury
    If you or someone you love suffered a serious injury as the result of another person?s negligence, you have the right to recover compensation.
  • Wrongful Death
    In cases involving wrongful death, the family members of the deceased may have a right to recover compensation for the pain and suffering their loved one endured before passing.

description:
If you've been injured in a crash, you deserve a great lawyer. At The Jaklitsch Law Group, our team of attorneys represents individuals who have suffered injuries as a result of another's negligence. For our clients in Upper Marlboro, throughout Maryland, Washington, D.C., and the Baltimore metropolitan area, we offer experienced and dedicated representation in a variety of accident and personal injury matters, including: car crashes, truck crashes, motorcycle crashes, wrongful death and serious or catastrophic injuries.

With more than 50 years of combined experience and an unwavering commitment to protecting the interests of our clients, our team of personal injury lawyers places a high premium on personal service and quality representation. Although no one sets out looking to be involved in an crash, when a wreck or other type of accident occurs due to the carelessness, reckless actions or negligent behavior of another, then you may be entitled to financial compensation for your losses. At our law firm, we help people understand the options before them, make sense of their situation and pursue the compensation owed to them. Come in for a free consultation and find out what YOUR options are.

If you or a loved one has been injured in an accident, it's imperative to act quickly to ensure that you give yourself every opportunity to receive the compensation you deserve. Whether dealing with the insurance company or filing a third-party lawsuit, we will put our experience and skill to work for you and your family.

Schedule a free initial consultation at our Upper Marlboro law office (or we can come to you) to discuss your case and learn how The Jaklitsch Law Group can help.
